patthana15.31:1.1_0: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.31:2.1_0: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.31:3.1_0: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nakenaci viññeyyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
